review:
Hi All,

I am from Kadapa, My son is suffering with cold and fever since last month onwards we showed in Kadapa and cold and fever not get down. we think to take him to hospital of Rainbow Hydernagar, Hyderabad we have taken appointment of Dr. Chandra Sekhar child specialist. he written some test to investigate the issue of my son and finally identified the issue and started the treatment. slowly the fever got down. Thanks to Dr, Chandra Sekhar and when comes to staff of Rainbow the way  service is given by Sister is good, we didn't treat it is not hospital  it is like home.

Once again Thanks.. for Rainbow Hospital .........
Though he is nice but he didnâ€™t answer patiently to parents. Please do respond clearly if the parents ask the same question so many times also.

** **** * ***** ****** ********* *** *** ******** ******* no investigation done to check what could have happened, what can be done to avoid such things. He is least bothered about parents questions and often makes fun out of it. ** *** *** **** ** ******** ********* ** ******* Sitting there as a doctor who's paid for consultation atleast show some responsibility and respect towards the profession. lack of interest in looking at kids can be clearly seen in his behaviour. we ae spending our quality time waiting for your consultation inspite of taking an appointment and you doesn't have interest to atleast look at the kid and do some investigation.
No way to recommend this specialist doctor where no time and patience to listen issue and earlier treatment details. Very much frustrated to answer if you ask more questions.

I had a bad experience with this doctor. He did not allow me to complete my problem statement. He does not have patience to listen to the patient. He hardly spent 2 minutes with us. I highly not recommend him.
Wait time is more. System is very money based, just churning out more appointments. ********* *** **** *** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Such a nice doctor, We are very happy with the doctor advise and the way he explains the problem in detail. I would definitely recommend to others.

My kid was having stomach ache very frequently. upon investigation in rainbow hospital it turned out that my kid got some lymph nodes. as a layman I don't know what it is. when i asked the doctor, he was a bit arrogant and did not explain what the nodes are. ** *** ** * **** ******* ** he has got attitude problem.

We had very bad experience. Earlier in the same hospital the lady paediatrician shared that our child is ok and she prescribed some medicines and come back after two days. But two days later due to non availability of the past doctor , we approached him. He wrote all kinds of tests ******* *** ***********
